# Grades across disciplines at SMI (B.Des, B.Voc, B.Fa)

This data-set contains grades of student across B.Des, B.Voc and B.Fa at SMI.

```{r}
#| label: setup

library(tidyverse)
library(mosaic)
library(ggformula)
library(crosstable)
library(broom)
library(supernova)
library(infer)
library(ggprism)
library(patchwork)
```

```{r}
grades <- read_csv("../../data/Grades.csv")
grades
```

```{r}
skimr::skim(grades)
```

```{r}
inspect(grades)
```
